PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-11272012-09-20,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 3
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, NO. 3 in order to (1) facilitate the decision made by the province of British Columbia to terminate the HST; (2) implement other amendments to the GST/HST regulations; and (3) make various technical and housekeeping amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0191 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 3
precis: Regulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, NO. 3 in order to (1) facilitate the decision made by the province of British Columbia to terminate the HST; (2) implement other amendments to the GST/HST regulations; and (3) make various technical and housekeeping amendments.
